verses.plain: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?

tokens.t: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?

verses.plain: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.

tokens.t: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.

verses.plain: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.

tokens.t: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.

verses.plain: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear;

tokens.t: Their poison
like the poison of a serpent:
like the deaf adder
stoppeth her ear;

verses.plain: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.

tokens.t: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.

verses.plain: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O LORD.

tokens.t: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O

verses.plain: Let them melt away as waters which run continually: when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.

tokens.t: Let them melt away as waters
run continually:
he bendeth
his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.

verses.plain: As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.

tokens.t: As a snail
melteth, let
pass away:
the untimely birth of a woman,
they may not see the sun.

verses.plain: Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in his wrath.

tokens.t: Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in
wrath.

verses.plain: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.

tokens.t: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.

verses.plain: So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.

tokens.t: So that a man shall say, Verily
a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.

footnotes.text: as soon…: Heb. from the belly
like the poison: Heb. according to the likeness, etc
charming…: or, be the charmer never so cunning
both…: Heb. as living as wrath
a reward…: Heb. fruit of the, etc
